description:
Imports a spreadsheet file and converts to a datatable.
Supported file formats: `.xlsx`, `.xlsm`, `.xlsb`, `.xls`, `.xls`, `.xls`, `.xls`, `.ods`, `.fods`, `.csv`, `.txt`, `.sylk`, `.html`, `.dif`, `.dbf`, `.rtf`, `.prn`, and `.eth`.

input.name: file
input.description: A list to be converted to a datatable.

input.name: sheetname
input.description:
The name of sheet from which the data will be read.
The first sheet will be used if `sheetname` is unspecified.

input.name: range
input.description:
A valid sheet range which contains data.
If unspecified, the whole sheet will be included.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing the sheet data.
